nodes.text: Whatever spin you give it it is hunger that is claiming its victims.
Apathy and hunger causes people to die
for anyone who visits Rajasthan's Baran district the apathy of the district administration and the failure of the Public Distribution System (pds) is clear to see.
the state and central governments would like the world to believe that the deaths were caused by disease and lack of hygiene rather than by abject poverty and starvation.
It's the old Orissa drought and starvation story being played out again.
Orissa story was made up to cover the real causes of casualties
